name: Stealthy Ninja (itch) (Luker_Luker)
description:
Hello, Koji. Uh, I don't know how to say this but, Hanzo got Nobuko.  Are you going to get Nobuko back? Great! Just remember, Hanzo is NOT a toy. He will do anything to defend Nobuko from getting rescued. Remember, good luck! And don't get caught. You never know what Hanzo can do to you.

If opening the file doesn't work: Go to scratch.mit.edu and create a project. Press file, load from your computer, and find the file. If that doesn't work search ninja_dudebro. If it doesn't work the first time then do it again. Click on my username on any of the projects then search for it there.
